医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明减少乳腺癌患者淋巴结切除的安全性已经开始扩散到腋窝淋巴结的乳腺癌患者，如果根据手术前化疗等抗癌疗法的反应量身定制治疗方案，则可以安全地避免广泛切除淋巴结。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Study-demonstrates-safe-reduction-of-lymph-node-removal-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Study-demonstrates-safe-reduction-of-lymph-node-removal-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbf06133-d92a-4b9e-b297-eaa7c2ebed17 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 12:12:00 -0400 Study demonstrates safe reduction of lymph node removal in breast cancer patients
研究表明，治疗焦虑和抑郁可显着减少心脏病患者的急诊就诊和再住院次数一项新的研究着眼于这一领域，以便为治疗此类患者的关键建议提供证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Study-suggests-treating-anxiety-and-depression-significantly-reduces-ER-visits-and-rehospitalizations-among-heart-disease-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Study-suggests-treating-anxiety-and-depression-significantly-reduces-ER-visits-and-rehospitalizations-among-heart-disease-病人.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7acdef93-24ce-4bf4-85d1-4bbcbb7305d1 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 11:12:00 -0400 Study suggests treating anxiety and depression significantly reduces ER visits and rehospitalizations among heart disease patients
基于人工智能的对话代理在年轻人的心理健康干预方面显示出希望全自动对话代理（CA）介导的干预措施，用于年轻人心理健康的情感部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/AI-based-conversational-agents-show-promise-in-young-peoples-mental-health-interventions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/AI-based-conversational-agents-show-promise-in-young-peoples-mental-health-interventions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=154750d0-943b-43eb-bde9-29aacbdb3717 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 10:51:00 -0400 AI-based conversational agents show promise in young people's mental health interventions
研究显示，健康对蓝莓干预措施的反应没有发现一致的模式蓝莓干预使用四分位数来定义血管和认知终点的个体间反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/No-concient-pattern-found-in-health-responses-to-blueberry-interventions-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/No-concient-pattern-found-in-health-responses-to-blueberry-interventions-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44864f78-aeea-45b1-8f96-891c34f1e68e Fri, 22 Mar 2024 10:17:00 -0400 No consistent pattern found in health responses to blueberry interventions, study shows
从青春期到更年期：Clue 首席执行官 Audrey Tsang 谈女性科技的力量在子宫内膜异位症意识月期间，NewsMedical 采访了 Clue 首席执行官 Audrey Tsang。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/From-Puberty-to-Menopause-Cluee28099s-CEO-Audrey-Tsang-on-the-Power-of-Femtech.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/From-Puberty-to-Menopause-Cluee28099s-CEO-Audrey-Tsang-on-the-Power-of-Femtech.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4dac5219-80a2-496c-b12d-ebfe1a62e1e9 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 08:35:00 -0400 From Puberty to Menopause: Clue’s CEO, Audrey Tsang on the Power of Femtech
加州扩大移民健康覆盖范围与医疗补助审查相冲突就在安东尼奥·阿本迪斯 (Antonio Abundis) 最需要的时候，加州医疗保险 (Medi-Cal) 健康保险开始生效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Californiae28099s-expanded-health-coverage-for-immigrants-collides-with-Medicaid-reviews.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Californiae28099s-expanded-health-coverage-for-immigrants-collides-with-Medicaid-reviews.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43198b7f-f665-4bdb-a50c-75e2472d50e9 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 08:17:50 -0400 California’s expanded health coverage for immigrants collides with Medicaid reviews
食用花卉绽放对健康有益研究分析了四种食用花卉的生物活性化合物、抗氧化活性和香气特征，有助于了解它们的营养和健康价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Edible-flowers-bloom-with-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Edible-flowers-bloom-with-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af84bbbd-7264-4f36-8ec2-acb69262a32d Fri, 22 Mar 2024 00:25:00 -0400 Edible flowers bloom with health benefits
研究探索植物性饮食中抗性淀粉的健康益处该评论评估了抗性淀粉在促进健康及其通过食品加工方法保持健康方面的作用，强调了当前膳食摄入量的差距以及通过增加植物性食品中抗性淀粉的消耗来改善全球健康的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Research-explores-the-health-benefits-of-pressive-starch-in-plant-based-diets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Research-explores-the-health-benefits-of-pressive-starch-in-plant-based-diets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=959cd5d8-8bc8-47ed-bff9-f54d0d0e5b8f Fri, 22 Mar 2024 00:02:00 -0400 Research explores the health benefits of resistant starch in plant-based diets
LungVax 疫苗利用 DNA 技术预防肺癌LungVax 疫苗由牛津大学、弗朗西斯·克里克研究所和伦敦大学学院的科学家开发，采用的技术类似于非常成功的牛津/阿斯利康 COVID-19 疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/LungVax-vaccine-uses-DNA-technology-to-prevent-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/LungVax-vaccine-uses-DNA-technology-to-prevent-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a282c0f-0a32-4644-8579-225bbaa10616 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 23:54:00 -0400 LungVax vaccine uses DNA technology to prevent lung cancer
性传播感染中抗生素耐药性不断上升：呼吁全球采取行动该评论深入探讨了性传播感染中抗菌素耐药性日益严峻的挑战，强调了创新治疗的必要性以及全球监测在管理淋病和梅毒等疾病方面的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Rising-antimicrobial-resistance-in-STI-A-call-for-global-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Rising-antimicrobial-resistance-in-STI-A-call-for-global-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e105729f-713f-4399-aa8c-b6c76223c146 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 23:47:00 -0400 Rising antimicrobial resistance in STIs: A call for global action
